title: Big
occurrences: OK, honey, big smile. Big smile!
(whistles) Whoa. Read this sign. "You must be at least this big to ride this ride."
Like a big, prehistoric insect with claws...
..Give Rachel a kiss from her big brother."
I'm not really a big one for parties. I like things that are a little more, uh... intimate.
OK. Now watch. It's really simple. Let me just get my big balls off here.
- You have a big gob of mustard right there. - What?
If you got a quarter in his mouth, you could make a wish. I did! I made a wish to be big.
..but we have a very big presentation to give tomorrow, so I'm gonna get some sleep.
